course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Real Estate Finance and Investment
course.description: This course will cover various concepts inherent in the financial analysis of real estate investments, apply these concepts to making critical analyses of various real estate investment proposals, and build upon these tools in formulating the capital structure of debt and equity for real estate transactions. The financial impacts of related topics such as environmental impacts, housing for low-income populations and government subsidy programs, and corporate social responsibility goals will also be discussed.
